## Fear
F: Fusion
"Bad thoughts about failure"   
"I can not do this"   
"It is too hard"   
"It will take me to long time"   

## fEar
E: Excessive Goals
- We get excited and want to change all NOW!   
- This leads to to unrealistic expectations & high risk of failure   
- Hard to keep up longterm   

## feAr
A: Avoidance of Discomfort
All types of change will feel uncomfortable and unfamiliar at first
Avoiding discomfort, taking the easy way out (=no change)
Change is scary!

## feaR
R: Remoteness from Values
Easy to loose goal and purpose   
"Why am I even doing this?"
